oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-12-29 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 29, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer) with his Texas Troubadours, guest performers Lonzo & Oscar, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb; Texas Troubadours; Rod Brasfield; Lonzo & Oscar; Tommy Jackson; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ernest Tubb -- The Women Make A Fool Out Of Me (Ernest Tubb) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Lonzo & Oscar -- Bring Back My Bonnie To Me (Lonzo & Oscar) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Tommy Jackson -- Katy Hill (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Ernest Tubb talks -- What A Friend We Have In Jesus (Ernest Tubb and his Texas Troubadours) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Ernest Tubb introduces Del Wood -- Ivory Corn (Del Wood)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Texas Troubadours; Byrd, Billy; Lonzo and Oscar
